name: Dungeon Revolt
description:
Incomplete RPG for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, with the theme Stronger Together.

In a typical fantasy dungeon, there's a sudden food shortage and all the monsters begin to be unfairly exploited! More than the usual anyway...

You are an overworked rat monster that decides that enough is enough and begins a revolt! 

Try to recruit every monster that you can to defeat The (evil) Lord and be free! We are Stronger Together!

PD: I barely finished so there is no sound, and the lighting got messed up a little so everything got brighter. Sorry!
